data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Net::Jabber is a widely used and liked module. With the pending
    IETF ratification of XMPP as an official protocol I want to make
    sure that there is as good support for it. I am basing Net::XMPP off
    of Net::Jabber, and eventually will make Net::Jabber require
    Net::XMPP for all of the core networking and functionality.
    Net::Jabber will become a set of extensions to Net::XMPP for doing
    things the "Jabber" way while leaving those who just want basic XMPP
    a much lighter module.
